ias_1_presentation.reason_of_the_status: Complete set of financial statements presented (statement of financial position, profit or loss and other comprehensive income, changes in equity, cash flows, notes). Comparative information provided. Fair presentation stated.

ias_2_inventories.reason_of_the_status: Inventories valued at lower of cost and net realizable value using weighted average method. Disclosure of categories (raw materials, WIP, finished goods), costing method, and NRV assessment provided.

ias_7_statement_of_cash_flows.reason_of_the_status: Cash flow statement prepared using direct method as encouraged by IAS 7. Reconciliation of net profit to cash flows from operating activities disclosed (note 37.00).

ias_8_accounting_policies.reason_of_the_status: Accounting policies disclosed in note 2. Changes in estimates noted (note 2.06). No changes in accounting policies reported.

ias_10_events_after_reporting_period.reason_of_the_status: 10% cash dividend recommended by Board after reporting date (27 Oct 2025) disclosed as non-adjusting event.

ias_12_income_taxes.reason_of_the_status: Current tax provided at higher of regular or minimum tax. Deferred tax calculated on temporary differences between carrying amounts and tax bases. Disclosures on tax rates, reconciliation, and deferred tax movement provided.

ias_16_property_plant_equipment.reason_of_the_status: PPE stated at cost less accumulated depreciation. Depreciation charged using reducing balance method. Revaluation of land disclosed. Disposal gains/losses recognized in P&L.

ias_19_employee_benefits.reason_of_the_status: Contributory provident fund, company insurance, and Workers Profit Participation Fund disclosed. No defined benefit plans.

ias_20_government_grants.reason_of_the_status: No government grants reported in financial statements.

ias_21_effects_of_changes_in_foreign_exc.reason_of_the_status: Foreign currency transactions converted at spot rate on transaction date. Gains/losses recognized in profit or loss. Functional currency is Bangladeshi Taka.

ias_23_borrowing_costs.reason_of_the_status: Borrowing costs directly attributable to qualifying assets capitalized. Others expensed. Effective interest method used.

ias_24_related_party_disclosures.reason_of_the_status: Transactions with key management personnel (directors) disclosed with amounts and nature (board meeting fees, remuneration).

ias_27_separate_financial_statements.reason_of_the_status: Company presents separate financial statements; no subsidiaries, associates, or joint ventures mentioned.

ias_28_investments_in_associates_and_joi.reason_of_the_status: No investments in associates or joint ventures reported.

ias_29_financial_reporting_in_hyperinfla.reason_of_the_status: Bangladesh is not considered a hyperinflationary economy.

ias_32_financial_instruments_presentatio.reason_of_the_status: Financial instruments classified appropriately. Equity and liabilities distinguished. Disclosures on terms and conditions of financial liabilities provided.

ias_33_earnings_per_share.reason_of_the_status: Basic EPS calculated and disclosed (Tk. 1.03). Weighted average number of shares used. No dilutive potential ordinary shares.

ias_34_interim_financial_reporting.reason_of_the_status: These are annual financial statements for year ended 30 June 2025.
